extends Object

Wrapper for command line calls to Windows powershell.

Since:
2.5.0
Author:
barakme

Nested Class Summary
static interface PowershellClient.PowerShellOutputListener
          Interface for clients that want to get the powershell output line-by-line rather then wait for the process to terminate and only then get the entire output.

invokeRemotePowershellCommand

public String invokeRemotePowershellCommand(String targetHost,
                                            String command,
                                            String username,
                                            String password,
                                            String localDir)
                                     throws PowershellClientException,
                                            InterruptedException
Executes a remote powershell command. using the client script.

Parameters:
targetHost - ip or host name of target machine.
command - the command to execute.
username - the username for the remote machine.
password - the password for the remote machine.
localDir - the local directory where the client script can be found.
Returns:
the output of the powershell process.
Throws:
PowershellClientException - if there was a problem executing the script.
InterruptedException - .
